group_1.textRight: ...Remember when you@took me to that show...?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: The Needle Roller show... @The guy's name was Sujita, right?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, uh... Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Well, it turns out he's an incredibly @quiet person offstage.

group_1.textLeft: Seriously?! @I didn't know that...
He's always the loud one when@they perform...

group_1.textRight: And do you know why he started performing?
He said he wanted to learn how to be@more outgoing.

group_1.textLeft: Wow...

group_1.textRight: So he's not the bright, eternally happy@person you thought he was.
Are you disappointed?

group_1.textLeft: Disappointed...? [chara:301901:motion_200:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]Why would I be?!
I mean, look at him!@He's incredible...!
I'm sure he's got problems like anybody@else when he's not onstage, yeah.
But he always manages to cheer me up when@he's performing, and that's what counts...

group_1.textRight: Exactly.
No matter where we are, or what @we do, or what time of day it is...
We can only ever be who we are.
But whether it's Sujita up on stage, or@you wishing to become a Magical Girl,
you both decided you wanted to create@a better version of yourself...
...That desire to change came from @within. Right?
So...[chara:300701:lipSynch_0]
That friend of yours...@What was her name?

group_1.textLeft: We all called her Yu.

group_1.textRight: Okay, so now I know her name.
But I don't know what she sounds@like or what kind of smile she has...
It wasn't her smile that cheered me up.
Or anyone else's, for that matter.
It was yours, Ayaka.

group_1.textLeft: *Gasp*
Y-you're[chara:301901:lipSynch_0]... You're right... @[chara:301901:motion_100:lipSynch_1]Oh, [chara:301901:tear_1]thank you, Shizuku!

group_1.textRight: Hehe...

group_1.textLeft: I'm okay... I'm okay, I'm okay!
I'm still me![chara:301901:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:301901:cheek_2:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301901:lipSynch_1] 100%[chara:301901:motion_0]!

group_1.textRight: That you are.

group_1.textLeft: Awww, yeah![chara:301901:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json] I'm back, baby!

group_1.textRight: Hehe, that's good to hear.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks for cheering me up like that, Shizuku!

group_1.textRight: Don't mention it.
(You've already done the @same for me far more often...)

group_1.textLeft: Oh man, I've got to repay you somehow!

group_1.textRight: You what?

group_1.textLeft: Lucky for you...
I scored two more tickets @to see Needle Roller!

group_1.textRight: (Oh no...!)

group_1.textLeft: I put in a request for two so I'd@be guaranteed to get at least one.
But for reasons I'll never understand,@there were actually tickets left over!
So I managed to get both tickets after all!@[chara:301901:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json]Can you believe it?

group_1.textRight: (Oh, I can believe it all right...)

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!@So let's go together, okay?!

group_1.textRight: Oh, I appreciate the offer, @[chara:300701:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]but I probably shouldn't...

group_1.textLeft: Awww, why not?[chara:301901:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json]
You're a Needle Roller fan, aren't you?

group_1.textRight: Uh, well, I—

group_1.textLeft: You knew all about Sujita's story, so@I figured you must be a huge fan by now!

group_1.textRight: Oh, that. Yeah, um...
(I just couldn't stop thinking @about how unfunny he was...)
(I had to know how someone so @unfunny got into the comedy business.)

group_1.textLeft: So you'll go, then?[chara:301901:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json] @Great! [chara:301901:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]Let's get amove on!

group_1.textRight: Hey, [chara:300701:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]wait!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, and...the show starts at five again,@and we're across town, sooo, ummm...

group_1.textRight: *Sigh*
(I guess it can't hurt...)

group_1.textCenter: Thank you, thank you! I'm Ayaka Mariko.@The champion of cheerfulness!
